entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
